content.title: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.
content.author: Dhammapada, Verse 1 (trans. K.R. Norman, 1997)
content.quote_text: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.

generation.prompt: Spider-Verse style mixed animation techniques combining multiple visual approaches, comic book halftone dot patterns and Ben-Day dots, dynamic perspective with dimensional depth effects, bold graphic design elements integrated naturally, multiple focal points creating visual rhythm across the frame. Capturing the vibe of mindfulness, attention, intention, awareness. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
generation.full_prompt: Create a 1024x1024 abstract artwork: Spider-Verse style mixed animation techniques combining multiple visual approaches, comic book halftone dot patterns and Ben-Day dots, dynamic perspective with dimensional depth effects, bold graphic design elements integrated naturally, multiple focal points creating visual rhythm across the frame. Capturing the vibe of mindfulness, attention, intention, awareness. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
